channel.title: A problem with my shops... plz help
channel.description:
Ok, when i edit a shop, and/or move the npc, this is the error i get:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3 2497 3 2503 3 4212 100" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)
im using pimpscape.
if anyone could help ill rep++, can i say that?

item.title: A problem with my shops... plz help
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

If you need to make/edit shops , I will give you a link to a tutorial on it .

And , go into what you edited and make sure everything is correct . A simple ; out of place can cause this .
